- Location: Front yard and driveway area of a single-story home; white vinyl fence along the right side.
- Parking surface: Vehicle parked on grass/dirt (no paved driveway).
- Exterior/landscape: Light stucco exterior; window near plants; tall yucca/palm close to siding.
- Grading/drainage: Ground appears flat with no visible drainage swales or standing water.
- Maintenance: Dry, patchy lawn; overgrown left hedge; blue trash bin near the front doorway.
